extendedInfo.description: Do you need help playing a Ruzzle or Scramble with Friends?  Download help now!Also lets you cheat at games such as Wordament, Dropwords and Boggle!  We also just added a new overlay mode that allows you to enter your letters and view the results inside the game.By clicking "Install" I agree to the License Agreement terms at http://www.firecrackersw.com/apps/scramble-solver-for-friends/scramble-solver-for-friends-eula/This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the popular game Scramble With Friends.This app is in no way associated with MAG Interactive, makers of the popular game Ruzzle.

reviews.title: Improvement
reviews.comment: Good tool doesn\'t really during a really game because you lose a lot of valuable time. But it helps you identify words while practicing for future use. Training the ruzzle mind.
reviews.author: Adrian Perkins

reviews.title: Decent for the price
reviews.comment: Great for solving puzzles. Don\'t think you\'re going to fool anyone with it, especially if you go from 200 point rounds to 500 point rounds instantly and you haven\'t found more words just bigger words.  Takes up allot of time.
reviews.author: David Stone

reviews.title: How to get a full 2 minutes
reviews.comment: Open the app & hit the minimize button at the bottom then go to Ruzzle. Input the letters & multipliers & hit solve. Once solved, slide the app right to hide it, exit from Ruzzle & go to your phones app manager (under \"settings\"). Force stop Ruzzle then restart it. Go back to the same game & the puzzle will restart with the same letters. Slide the app left to open & enjoy!
reviews.author: Paul Williams

reviews.title: Did work great until the 31jan update
reviews.comment: The update to the ruzzle game keeps not letting you use both apps.. Guess i gotta play the old fashioned way
reviews.author: chino chacon

reviews.title: Nice but need...
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app and all but it be a good idea to have the your solutions slide by its self that way you don\'t waste more time have to do it yourself.
reviews.author: Edgar Martinelli

reviews.title: Motorola photon
reviews.comment: Good app works for a couple of games then when i try to switch over to ruzzle after typing in the letters it says security exception and doesn\'t let me finish the game Would be 5. Stars if fixed
reviews.author: Ryan Moss

reviews.comment: Please, please, please do an overlay with this app and I will give it five stars. This app wastes too much time going back and forth to the words!!!! I get a higher score playing without this!
reviews.author: Alcola Johnson

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Great, I enjoy learning new words as I go. No complaints.
reviews.author: April Coleman

reviews.title: Ruzzle Cheats
reviews.comment: This app is okay will be great if there\'s a overlay. really haven\'t  loose too much time. I enjoy this app.
reviews.author: Tiffany Locke

reviews.title: Ruzzle recognized the cheat
reviews.comment: Made me get zero points even though I didnt use the cheat till the last 10 seconds :-(  but it used to be great
reviews.author: Tasha Roybal

reviews.title: Improvement
reviews.comment: I NEVER lose anymore against my mother. Plus they app is extremely helpful because some of these words you\'d never find unless you\'re a bookworm.
reviews.author: Dashyria Horne

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love app its very useful. I can win some matches now. It should be a way to disguise the app icon on your phone
reviews.author: Charles Green

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Once you figure out how to use it wisely, it\'s a great tool to completely dominate your friends and they\'re just like, \"what\'s going on?\" lol
reviews.author: Lindsay Mead

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: It helps you to beat those know-it-all. Its very time consuming though. But other than that great app.
reviews.author: TreQuan Young

reviews.title: Great, but.......
reviews.comment: Awesome app but PLEASE find a better time to put FULL SCREEN ADS!!!! And fix the \"Security Exception\" thing cuz thats really annoying. I would give one more star for ads being in a better place and one more for fixing security exception thing.
reviews.author: Joe Quenichet

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: What do i do if it keeps saying anti cheat activated ??
reviews.author: Cj Robinson

reviews.title: Hello
reviews.comment: Man this app is valid. Everyone should download this if you dnt hold my yango sauce
reviews.author: brian dinnall

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.comment: I thought it would Help me during my ruzzle sessions but I was wrong...unistalling
reviews.author: Marcel Moore

reviews.title: Loooove it <3
reviews.comment: at first, it was hard for me to get the hang of using it. but within 20 mins, i was a master! download this you guys. its one of the best \"apps\" i downloaded in awhile. ***oh and a tip, SCREENSHOT THE PUZZLE, THEN FILL IT IN TO SAVE TIME
reviews.author: Desiree Hill

reviews.title: Still workin on it?
reviews.comment: slows me down. i tried it once and scored a big fat zero cuz all my time ran out fukkin with this!!!
reviews.author: Deitra Williams
